Week 1
 Monday
 Breakfast: <font color="#0E84B4">Scrambled egg</font> and <font color="#0E84B4">smoked salmon</font>
 Snack 1: Handful of <font color="#ffff00">mixed nuts</font> (Cashews, macadamias)
 Lunch: <font color="#0E84B4">Beef mince</font> and <font color="#337658">mixed veggies</font>
 Snack 2: <font color="#0E84B4">Hard boiled eggs</font>
 Dinner: <font color="#0E84B4">Steak burger</font>, <font color="#6668BF">sweet potato fries</font>, <font color="#337658">asparagus</font>
